name: Longfellow Elementary Beacon Program
description: Longfellow Elementary Beacon Program offers school support programs: Phoenix Risers: Morning care from 7:00am - 9:30am After school enrichment tutoring, special skills and electives Girls Got Goals (3rd - 8th grades): Girls soccer focused on developing relationships, teamwork, athletic skills & health education Linked Day: Academic, SEL & behavior support during school plus lunch clubs Additional Programs: Camps: Summer playhouse & vacation break Community Events: Carnaval, ReclaMision & Spring
fullDescription: Longfellow Elementary Beacon Program offers school support programs: Phoenix Risers: Morning care from 7:00am - 9:30am After school enrichment tutoring, special skills and electives Girls Got Goals (3rd - 8th grades): Girls soccer focused on developing relationships, teamwork, athletic skills & health education Linked Day: Academic, SEL & behavior support during school plus lunch clubs Additional Programs: Camps: Summer playhouse & vacation break Community Events: Carnaval, ReclaMision & Spring
whatTheyOffer: Longfellow Elementary Beacon Program offers school support programs: Phoenix Risers: Morning care from 7:00am - 9:30am After school enrichment tutoring, special skills and electives Girls Got Goals (3rd - 8th grades): Girls soccer focused on developing relationships, teamwork, athletic skills & health education Linked Day: Academic, SEL & behavior support during school plus lunch clubs Additional Programs: Camps: Summer playhouse & vacation break Community Events: Carnaval, ReclaMision & Spring
howToGetIt: For more information about programming at Cesar Chavez please contact: Luis Bautista, Longfellow Program Manager luisbg@jamestownsf.org Eileen Molina, Longfellow Program Assistant eileenm@jamestownsf.org
